SA15dhksparu:84: 00001 pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
SA15dhksparu:85: 00001 tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:86: 00002 rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhksparu:87: 00002 tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:88: 00003 para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:89: 00003 saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:91: 00004 kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
SA15dhksparu:92: 00005 tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
SA15dhksparu:93: 00005 ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
SA15dhksparu:97: 00007 prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
SA15dhksparu:99: 00008 tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
SA15dhksparu:100: 00009 yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
SA15dhksparu:101: 00009 upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan
SA15dhksparu:104: 00011 dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
SA15dhksparu:106: 00012 yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
SA15dhksparu:107: 00012 bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
SA15dhksparu:109: 00013 apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
SA15dhksparu:114: 00016 bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā

SA15dhksparu:118: 00018 bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
SA15dhksparu:119: 00018 bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
SA15dhksparu:121: 00019 anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhksparu:122: 00020 janane api hi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinā
SA15dhksparu:123: 00020 samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
SA15dhksparu:124: 00021 tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
SA15dhksparu:125: 00021 sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
SA15dhksparu:126: 00022 saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
SA15dhksparu:128: 00023 saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
SA15dhksparu:132: 00025 teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
